island_of_dogs: ^This island is full of dogs! Amazing.
^1 member of your crew decides to stay behind and live with the dogs.
island_of_frogs: ^This island is covered by frogs! Fascinating.
^Also you find a few coins in the sand.
abandoned_island: ^There's nobody here ... wait, no -- someone has been stranded here! She's barely alive. You nurse her back to health, and she joins your crew.
cyclops: ^A terrible cyclops has made this island his home.

s: ^Offer to let him eat your crew.

c-0: ^He loves it, and drinks several barrels. You slip away as he sleeps it off.
^You'll have to buy more wine at the next port. It should cost about 5 coins.
c-1: ^He happily devours 3 members of your crew. They are so delicious that he gives you 20 gold coins before sending you on your way.

b: ^You have arrived home, but can't dock the ship without any crew to help you.
^You have arrived home, but can't afford the docking fee of 5 gold coins.
^You have arrived home. Argos and Penelope are delighted. You win!
